name: Easy Maintenance
author: S M Shafiuzzaman

sections.description:
This plugin can be used when your site is under maintenance mood. If any visitor visit in pages of your site they will be redirect and they will see your message. You can also set a page for this. You can also use this for landing page

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. You can use html text
  2. You can use already created page
  3. You can activate or deactivate any time without plugin uninstallation
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Easy Maintenance screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Can I decative it anytime?

Yes, You can from pluggin settings

Can i use only text without header or footer?

Yes, You can

Can i use any page already created?

Yes, You can

short_description: This plugin can be used for Maintenance mood. Even you can use this as Coming soon page, Landin Page. You can use your pages or any text to display
